final_answer.precision_note: Integer precision as input bond energies are integers.

method: Reaction: CH4 + 2O2 -> CO2 + 2H2O. Bonds broken: 4(C-H) + 2(O=O) = 4(413) + 2(498) = 1652 + 996 = 2648 kJ/mol. Bonds formed: 2(C=O) + 4(O-H) = 2(805) + 4(463) = 1610 + 1852 = 3462 kJ/mol. deltaH = Bonds Broken - Bonds Formed = 2648 - 3462 = -814 kJ/mol.
